Properties.ProtectedString:
function WaitForChild(parent,child) while not parent:FindFirstChild(child) do wait() print('waiting for ' .. child) end return parent[child] end
local ProjectileScript = WaitForChild(script.Parent,'IncinerateServer')
local Gravity = (-9.81*20)
local NumAimLines = 10 local ArcHeight = 10 local ArcDistance = 20
local AimCycleLength = 3
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = WaitForChild(Tool, 'Handle') local firesound = WaitForChild(Handle,'Sound') local Player = game.Players.LocalPlayer local pmouse = Player:GetMouse() local MouseDown = Instance.new('BoolValue') MouseDown.Value = false
local UpdateAimLines = false
local AimLines = {}
function MakeProjectile() local tpart = Instance.new('Part') tpart.Name = 'Effect' tpart.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) tpart.CanCollide = false local tmesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') tmesh.Parent = tpart tmesh.Scale = Vector3.new(.25,.25,.25) tmesh.MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=94736101' tmesh.TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=102496105' tmesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(2,1,1) local tfire = Instance.new('Fire') tfire.Parent = tpart --[[ local tpart2 = Instance.new('Part') tpart2.Name = 'Effect' tpart2.Parent = tpart tpart2.Size = Vector3.new(.2,.2,.2) tpart2.CFrame = tpart.CFrame + Vector3.new(0,0,-.2) tpart2.CanCollide = false tpart2.Transparency = .5
local tweld = Instance.new("Weld") tweld.Part0 = tpart tweld.Part1 = tpart2 tweld.C0 = CFrame.new() tweld.C1 = tpart2.CFrame:inverse() * tpart.CFrame tweld.Parent = tpart --]] return tpart end
function InitAimLines() if #AimLines>0 then return end for i=1,10,1 do local tpart = Instance.new('Part') tpart.Name = 'Effect' tpart.FormFactor = 'Custom' tpart.Size = Vector3.new(.4,.4,.4) tpart.Transparency = .5 tpart.Anchored = true tpart.CanCollide = false tpart.Parent= Tool table.insert(AimLines,tpart) end end
local CanFire = true
function ClickDown(mouse) if CanFire then MouseDown.Value = true
UpdateAimLines = true Spawn(UpdateAim)
Spawn(function() local startTime = tick() while MouseDown.Value do local alpha = math.min(((tick()-startTime)/AimCycleLength),1) ArcDistance = 3+(alpha*30) ArcHeight = -(alpha*10)+15 wait(1/30) end end) end end
function ClickUp(mouse) if CanFire then firesound:play() CanFire = false MouseDown.Value = false UpdateAimLines = false --do fireing code local proj = MakeProjectile() proj.CanCollide = false proj.Anchored =true proj.Parent = Workspace local tscript = ProjectileScript:Clone() tscript.Parent= proj Delay(.2,function() tscript.Disabled = false end) proj.CFrame = Handle.CFrame --print(ArcHeight) local direction = Handle.CFrame.p-AimLines[1].CFrame.p direction = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(),Vector3.new(direction.x,0,direction.z).unit) local yvel = math.sqrt(math.abs(ArcHeight*Gravity*2)) local xvel = (ArcDistance*2)/((yvel/Gravity)*2) proj.Velocity = Vector3.new(0,yvel,0)+(direction*CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0,0,-xvel))).p proj.Anchored=false --game.Debris:AddItem(proj,5) wait(1) print('click up') CanFire = true end end
function UpdateAim()
while UpdateAimLines do --print('updating aim lines') local initpoint =Handle.CFrame.p local target = pmouse.Hit.p local direction = (initpoint-target) direction = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(),Vector3.new(direction.x,0,direction.z).unit) local arcConst = ArcHeight/(ArcDistance*ArcDistance) for i=1,#AimLines,1 do local xpos =(((ArcDistance*2)/#AimLines)*i)- ArcDistance AimLines[i].Transparency =0 AimLines[i].CFrame = (direction*CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0,(-arcConst*math.pow(xpos,2))+ArcHeight,xpos+ArcDistance)))+initpoint end wait(1/30) end
for _, i in pairs(AimLines) do i.Transparency =1 end end
local isequipped = false
function OnEquipped(nmouse) if not isequipped then isequipped = true local mouse = Player:GetMouse() mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() ClickDown(mouse) end) mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() ClickUp(mouse) end) --mouse.Icon = InitAimLines()
print('finished init') end
end
function OnUnequipped() if isequipped then isequipped = false CanFire = true print('unequipped called') MouseDown.Value = false Tool.Enabled = true UpdateAimLines = false for _,i in pairs(AimLines) do i:Destroy() end AimLines = {} end end
script.Parent.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped)
script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)

local SpreadSpeed = .5 local MaxVolume = 9*9*9 local VolumeFireConst = 4.5 --volume of part to size of fire local MaxPartsBurned = 20
local Textures = { Ash = 102496105,
}
local AshColor = Vector3.new(42/255,53/255,55/255)
local Sounds = { Fire = 102503996, } --yay lua has no definable enums, IM SO HAPPY ABOUT THIS local BurnStates = { wait = 1, burn = 2, done = 3, } --aren't character meshes just Greeeeaaat? local CharacterMeshToPart = {}
CharacterMeshToPart[ Enum.BodyPart.LeftArm ] = 'Left Arm' CharacterMeshToPart[ Enum.BodyPart.LeftLeg ] = 'Left Leg' CharacterMeshToPart[ Enum.BodyPart.RightArm ]= 'Right Arm' CharacterMeshToPart[ Enum.BodyPart.RightLeg ]= 'Right Leg' CharacterMeshToPart[ Enum.BodyPart.Head ]= 'Head' CharacterMeshToPart[ Enum.BodyPart.Torso ]= 'Torso'
local Parent = script.Parent
--all parts ever registered local RegisteredParts = {}
local TouchConnections = {}
function RegisterModel(nchar) --array of tables with: --state --part (associated part for character meshes) --owner (root object) local Parts = {} local BodyMeshes = {} for _, i in pairs(nchar:GetChildren()) do if i:IsA('CharacterMesh') then local nentry ={} nentry['owner'] = i nentry['state'] = BurnStates['wait'] print(i.BodyPart) nentry['part'] = nchar:FindFirstChild(CharacterMeshToPart[i.BodyPart]) if nentry['part'] then RegisteredParts[nentry['part'] ] = true end table.insert(BodyMeshes,nentry) elseif i:IsA('Humanoid') then local thum = i Spawn(function() local startTime = tick() while tick()- startTime<5 do thum:TakeDamage(1) wait(1/15) end end ) elseif i:IsA('Hat') then local t_hat = i Delay(5*.75, function() t_hat:Destroy() end) end end
Delay(5*.75, function()
local nhat = Instance.new('Hat') nhat.AttachmentPos= Vector3.new(0,-.15,0) local nhandle = Instance.new('Part') nhandle.Name = 'Handle' nhandle.FormFactor = 'Custom' nhandle.Size = Vector3.new(1.45, 0.38, 2) local nmesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') nmesh.MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=102706424' nmesh.TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=102706523' nmesh.Parent = nhandle nhandle.Parent = nhat nhat.Parent= nchar end)
for _, i in pairs(nchar:GetChildren()) do if i:IsA('Part') and not RegisteredParts[i] then local nentry ={} nentry['owner'] = i nentry['state'] = BurnStates['wait'] table.insert(Parts,nentry) RegisteredParts[i]=true end end
while #BodyMeshes ~= 0 do local tentry = BodyMeshes[#BodyMeshes] table.remove(BodyMeshes) if tentry['part'] then burnPart(tentry['part'], 5,false) local tmesh = tentry['owner'] Delay(5*.75, function() print('getting here') tmesh.BaseTextureId = 102496105 tmesh.OverlayTextureId = 102496105 end) end wait(1)
end
while #Parts ~=0 do local tentry = Parts[#Parts] table.remove(Parts) if tentry['owner'] then burnPart(tentry['owner'], 5,false) wait(1) end end end
function burnPart(part, length, breakJoints) local partVolume = part.Size.x*part.Size.y*part.Size.z local nsound = Instance.new('Sound') nsound.SoundId ='http://roblox.com/asset/?id='..Sounds['Fire'] nsound.Parent = part nsound.Looped = true nsound.Volume = 0 nsound:Play() game.Debris:AddItem(nsound,length+1) local nfire = Instance.new('Fire') nfire.Heat = 1 nfire.Size = 2 nfire.Parent = part game.Debris:AddItem(nfire,length+1) local stage2Delay = length *.75
local tconnect = part.Touched:connect(function(hit) onTouch(part,hit,length) end) table.insert(TouchConnections,tconnect) --change color/texture of any meshes for _,i in pairs(part:GetChildren()) do if i:IsA('SpecialMesh') and i.MeshType == 'FileMesh' then Spawn(function() local startTime = tick() while tick()-startTime<stage2Delay do wait(1/30) end i.TextureId = 'http://roblox.com/asset/?id=' .. Textures['Ash'] end) end end
--tween fire size, sound volume Spawn(function () local startTime = tick() while tick()-startTime<stage2Delay do local alpha = (tick()-(startTime))/(stage2Delay) nfire.Heat = 5 --TODO nfire.Size = partVolume*VolumeFireConst*alpha nsound.Volume = alpha wait(1/30) end
tconnect:disconnect()
while tick()-startTime<length do local alpha = 1-((tick()-(startTime+stage2Delay))/(length-stage2Delay)) nfire.Heat = 5*alpha nfire.Size = partVolume*VolumeFireConst*alpha nsound.Volume = alpha wait(1/30) end end)
end --[[ while true do if math.random(0,1) and #Parts then
elseif #BodyMeshes then
end wait(SpreadSpeed) end --]]
function onTouch(owner,hit,burnTime) if #RegisteredParts<MaxPartsBurned and tick()-burnTime>SpreadSpeed and hit.Name ~= 'Effect' and not RegisteredParts[hit] then if hit.Size.x*hit.Size.y*hit.Size.z<MaxVolume then burnPart(hit, 5, false) MaxPartsBurned = MaxPartsBurned+1 end if hit.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then RegisterModel(hit.Parent) end end end
table.insert(TouchConnections, Parent.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hit.Size.x*hit.Size.y*hit.Size.z<MaxVolume and hit.Name ~= 'Effect' then Parent.Anchored = true Parent.Transparency = 1 Parent.CFrame = CFrame.new(0,1000000,0) onTouch(Parent,hit,0) end end))
local ExecuteTime = tick() while #RegisteredParts<MaxPartsBurned and tick()-ExecuteTime<20 do wait(1/30) end
for _, i in pairs(TouchConnections) do i:disconnect() end wait(5)
script.Parent:Destroy()
